name: 8Bit Highway: Retro Racing
description:
This is a small game about blowing up money trucks and driving through traffic on endless highway from South to North! Try to escape from police, collect score points and money for new car.

FEATURES:

- Simple and addictive gameplay

- Great pixelart style and retro music

- Various cars, power-ups and backgrounds

- Google Play achievements and leaderboard

- Small apk size (less than 20 mb)

UPDATE 2.0!

- New gameplay features
- Other cars can chanege line now
- Powerups reworked
- Copter mechanics reworked
- New effects
- Fixed in-app purchase
- Huge perfomance optimisation and many fixes
